Class BonusOrb

java.lang.Object
Orbs.BonusOrb
All Implemented Interfaces:
SnakeOrbs
public class BonusOrb extends Object implements SnakeOrbs
Represents a "Bonus Points Orb" in the game, gives double points (compared with Good Orb) to the player when collected. This orb increases the score

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    BonusOrb(Grid grid)
    Constructs a new BonusOrb with the specified grid for positioning.

  • Method Details

    • randomSpawn

      public void randomSpawn()
      Spawns the Bonus orb at a random location on the grid. The orb is drawn as a rectangle and with a picture
      Specified by:
      randomSpawn in interface SnakeOrbs

      public int getScore()
      Returns the score points associated with this orb.

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Deletes the bonus orb from the game, making it inactive. Removes the graphical representation of the orb.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface SnakeOrbs

    • getBuffer

      public int getBuffer()
      Returns the buffer value for the bonus orb. This increments the size of the snake (+2)
      Specified by:
      getBuffer in interface SnakeOrbs
      Returns:
      the buffer value.

    • active

      public boolean active()
      Checks if the bonus orb is currently active in the game.
      Specified by:
      active in interface SnakeOrbs
      Returns:
      true if the orb is active, false otherwise.
